page.title: 11NURSERY/PLAYGROUP SEER GREEN
page.content: The Pavilion is used by the Seer Green Village playgroup which meets 5 days a week from 9.15am to noon.The playgroup began on January 12th 1973.Its present leader is Mrs.Gloria Walker who is paid 200p per hour.The children,who come from Seer Green,Chalfont St Peter and Chalfont St Giles, start play- group in the term in which they are 3 and they leave aged 4 1/2.The children are allow ed to choose from a wide range of acti- vities which include lego,painting,draw ing,jigsaws,gluing,play-doh,rhyming games and story.They also go on trips. This year they have visited Bekonscot model village in Beaconsfield,a farm to ee the spring lambs and the local Fire Station.
